text: Ezɨ Isbosetɨn mɨdorozir gumazir pumuning, aning mɨdorozir gumazibar dapanimɨn ikia ghua apaniba ko mɨsosi. Aningɨn ziamning, Bana ko Rekap, aning Rimonɨn otarimning. Rimon, a Berotɨn nguibar ekiamɨn gumazir mam. Gumazamiziba Benjaminɨn adarazi bagha Berotɨn nguibar ekiam ginaba, kamaghɨn amizɨ, gumazir kamning aning Benjaminɨn anabamɨn adarazir aven iti.
